DOC.brief_summary: Objective : evaluate effect speech therapy exercise program treatment Obstructive Sleep Apna Syndrome ( OSAS ) patient base clinical polysomnography ( PSG ) parameter . Methods : 80 patient OSAS evaluate : men , 25-65 year old , body mass index < 35 kg/m2 score Epworth Sleepiness Scale > 9 . Patients divide four group : I : 20 patient OSAS underwent speech therapy ; II : 20 patient OSAS underwent placebo therapy Speech Therapy ; III : 20 patient start treatment CPAP underwent speech therapy ; IV : 20 patient start treatment CPAP without speech therapy placebo . The speech therapy include isometric isotonic exercise improve posture , mobility muscle tone soft palate , pharyngeal constrictor muscle , tip base tongue , cheek lip . Placebo therapy include relaxation exercise stretch neck , without therapeutic purpose . Both therapy apply three month , three time day , last 20 minute session . During treatment , subject monitor weekly meeting , orientation description exercise return fulfil exercise diary . The subject also follow CPAP clinic return one week , month end study . Conduct assessments treatment twenty one day washout , include : assess upper airway , anthropometric investigation facial skeleton speech Orofacial , questionnaires ( Epworth Sleepiness Scale , FOSQ , General Segment use CPAP , WHOQOL-BREF , snore ) , Psychomotor Vigilance Test PSG .
